text:
@Jim_Jordan https://t.co/7mWg6nRWAl 
“In response to COVID-19,US slow to act when each day of inaction mattered most–in terms of public health harms,severe economic costs.Trump/closest senior officials disseminated misinformation that left public less safe,more vulnerable.”.@DispatchAlerts
